reviewText: This is a totally amazing movie... Whether you are part of the Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender or Straight Alliance Community, this is a must see film. It perfectly highlights today's fight for equal rights and LGBT equality with an interesting story line. I love it!

I found this to be a really important story addressing Gay Marriage at a time when it is a central potical issue.  After hearing the President come out in support of Gay Marriage this week I would hope more people would watch this film for a peek into the lives of a gay couple trying to make a relationship with a child work in this difficult world.  Great performances enhance a thought provoking plot with an "I didn't see that coming" ending.  I hope you enjoy it as well.
